I encountered an error
ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'conv3_1/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg': Input tensor 'conv3_1/BatchNorm/moving_mean:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref.
when using BatchNorm layer in slim. Not sure how to solve it...

body:
I encountered an error 
`ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'conv3_1/BatchNorm/AssignMovingAvg': Input tensor 'conv3_1/BatchNorm/moving_mean:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref.` 
when using BatchNorm layer in slim. Not sure how to solve it...
